channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 29th November
item.description:
Some broken & dirty dumped items left in the street. Getting peed on by dogs and then rummaged by passers-by. I'm too busy to take this to the tip myself this time. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mount Ephraim Lane, Streatham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Compacted leaves on Wheathill Rd nearly corner Penge Rd, 29th November
item.description:
Compacted leafing stuck along curb, double yellow lines covered. Along curb Wheathill Rd nearly Penge Rd. Please scrape them away thoroughly. Most leaves have now fallen. Thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wheathill Road, Anerley, Greater London
